table.c: 金蝶库存变化监视脚本
table.stmt: SELECT top 1 last_user_update FROM sys.dm_db_index_usage_stats WHERE database_id = DB_ID('AIS20130314203706') AND last_user_update IS NOT NULL AND object_id=object_id('[AIS20130314203706].[dbo].[ICInventory]')

table.c: 金蝶未审核单据监视脚本
table.stmt: SELECT d.fitemid as ProductId, d.FSCStockID as stockId , convert(int,SUM(d.FAuxQty)) as qty FROM [AIS20130314203706].[dbo].[ICStockBill] h JOIN [AIS20130314203706].[dbo].[ICStockBillEntry] d on h.FInterID = d.FInterID JOIN [AIS20130314203706].[dbo].[t_ICItem] i on d.FItemID = i.FItemID JOIN [AIS20130314203706].[dbo].[t_Stock] s on s.FItemID = d.FSCStockID WHERE h.frob=1 and h.fstatus=0 and h.FCancellation=0 and i.f_112 is not null and h.FTranType =41 and s.fnumber in ('3.01','3.03','3.05','4.01','4.03','4.04','4.05','4.06','5.01','5.03','5.05','6.01','6.03','6.05','2.01','2.03','2.05','9.01','9.03','9.05','7.01','7.03','7.05','8.01','8.03','8.05') GROUP by i.fnumber ,i.f_112,d.fitemid,d.FSCStockID UNION ALL SELECT d.fitemid as ProductId, d.FDCStockID as stockId, convert(int,SUM(d.FAuxQty)) as qty FROM [AIS20130314203706].[dbo].[ICStockBill] h JOIN [AIS20130314203706].[dbo].[ICStockBillEntry] d on h.FInterID = d.FInterID JOIN [AIS20130314203706].[dbo].[t_ICItem] i on d.FItemID = i.FItemID JOIN [AIS20130314203706].[dbo].[t_Stock] s on s.FItemID = d.FDCStockID WHERE h.frob=1 and h.fstatus=0 and h.FCancellation=0 and i.f_112 is not null and h.FTranType =21 and s.fnumber in ('3.01','3.03','3.05','4.01','4.03','4.04','4.05','4.06','5.01','5.03','5.05','6.01','6.03','6.05','2.01','2.03','2.05','9.01','9.03','9.05','7.01','7.03','7.05','8.01','8.03','8.05') GROUP BY i.fnumber ,i.f_112,i.fname,h.fstatus,d.fitemid,d.FDCStockID

SELECT b.productid, counter.Warehouse AS stockId, sum(b.quantity) as qty FROM bus_order a JOIN bus_orderdetail b ON a.orderno = b.orderno JOIN base_counter counter on counter.CounterID=a.CounterId WHERE a.orderstatus in ('1','2','3','4','5','10') AND ifnull(b.detailType,0)=0 GROUP BY b.productid,counter.Warehouse

SELECT counter.Warehouse AS stockId, detail.quantity, detail.cartDetailDescs FROM bus_cartdetail detail INNER JOIN bus_cart cart ON detail.cartid = cart.CartId INNER JOIN base_counter counter ON counter.CounterID = cart.CounterId WHERE cart. STATUS = 2 AND (?-cart.lastupdate<?)
